6 class Pkcs7Exception : public LibCryptoSecException
7 {
8 public:
9  enum ErrorCode
10  {
11  UNKNOWN,
12  INVALID_PKCS7,
13  INVALID_TYPE,
14  DECRYPTING,
15  INTERNAL_ERROR,
16  INVALID_SYMMETRIC_CIPHER,
17  INVALID_CERTIFICATE,
18  ADDING_SIGNER,
19  ADDING_CERTIFICATE,
20  };
21  Pkcs7Exception(std::string where)
22  {
23  this->where = where;
24  this->errorCode = Pkcs7Exception::UNKNOWN;
25  }
26  Pkcs7Exception(Pkcs7Exception::ErrorCode errorCode, std::string where)

30  }
31  Pkcs7Exception(Pkcs7Exception::ErrorCode errorCode, std::string where, bool opensslDetails)
32  {
33  this->where = where;
34  this->errorCode = errorCode;
35  if (opensslDetails)
36  {
37  this->details = OpenSSLErrorHandler::getErrors();
38  }
39  else
40  {
41  this->details = "";
42  }
43  }
44  virtual ~Pkcs7Exception() throw () {}
45  virtual std::string getMessage() const
46  {
47  return (Pkcs7Exception::errorCode2Message(this->errorCode));
48  }
49  virtual std::string toString() const
50  {
51  std::string ret;
52  if (this->errorCode == Pkcs7Exception::UNKNOWN)
53  {
54  ret = "Pkcs7Exception. Called by: " + this->where + ".";
55  }
56  else
57  {
58  ret = "Pkcs7Exception: " + Pkcs7Exception::errorCode2Message(this->errorCode) + ". Called by: " + this->where + ".";
59  }
60  if (this->details != "")
61  {
62  ret += " More details:\n" + this->details + ".";
63  }
64  return ret;
65  }
66  virtual Pkcs7Exception::ErrorCode getErrorCode()
67  {
68  return this->errorCode;
69  }
70  static std::string errorCode2Message(Pkcs7Exception::ErrorCode errorCode)
71  {
72  std::string ret;
73  switch (errorCode)
74  {
75  case Pkcs7Exception::UNKNOWN:
76  ret = "Unknown error";
77  break;
78  case Pkcs7Exception::INVALID_PKCS7:
79  ret = "Invalid pkcs7 structure";
80  break;
81  case Pkcs7Exception::INVALID_TYPE:
82  ret = "Invalid type";
83  break;
84  case Pkcs7Exception::DECRYPTING:
85  ret = "Decrypting";
86  break;
87  case Pkcs7Exception::INTERNAL_ERROR:
88  ret = "Internal error";
89  break;
90  case Pkcs7Exception::INVALID_SYMMETRIC_CIPHER:
91  ret = "Invalid symmetric cipher";
92  break;
93  case Pkcs7Exception::INVALID_CERTIFICATE:
94  ret = "Invalid certificate";
95  break;
96  case Pkcs7Exception::ADDING_SIGNER:
97  ret = "Adding signer";
98  break;
99  case Pkcs7Exception::ADDING_CERTIFICATE:
100  ret = "Adding certificate";
101  break;
102 // case Pkcs7Exception:::
103 // ret = "";
104 // break;
105 // case Pkcs7Exception:::
106 // ret = "";
107 // break;
108  }
109  return ret;
110  }
111 
112 protected:
